name: Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Hazelnut, Orange Blossom, Madagascar Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense, the latest addition to the Dolce&Gabbana Devotion olfactory story, celebrates the brandu2019s unwavering dedication to Italian design and craftmanship..About the Bottle:Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense is housed in a vibrant amber-tinted glass bottle beautifully adorned with the unmistakably symbolic Sacred Heart..About the Fragrance:Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense revisits the original fragrance with deeper and more enveloping notes. This fragrance was created by Olivier Cresp for Dolce&Gabbana.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Vanillin, Hexamethylindanopyran, Aqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Citrus Limon Peel Oil (Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil), Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral, Linalyl Acetate, Coumarin, Pinene, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geranyl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Terpineol, Citronellol, Benzaldehyde, Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Citrus Aurantium Bergamiapeel Oil (Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot Peel Oil), Carvone, Terpinolene, Cananga Odorata Oil/Extract, Rose Ketones, Benzyl Benzoate, Farnesol, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

shades.shade_name: 3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray
1 oz / 30 ml eau de parfum spray
1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

I have purchased some of their other fragrances before and like the others this one didnu2019t disappoint. It has a nice subtle scent and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light, bright floral perfume that can be worn all day. I really liked that it wasnu2019t super strong like a lot of perfumes are nowadays. The scent is very familiar but not sure what exactly it is. Can definitely be an everyday scent.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful scent but smells really familiar!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! It is warm and spicy and smells sweet with a vanilla vibe on the dry down. It also has sort of middle eastern vibe to it and I felt like I have smelled this scent somewhere before but couldn't pinpoint it. Then, after smelling it on my wrist all day after spraying it at the store, it came to me, This smells a lot like Ajwad from Lattafa, if anyone is familiar with that scent which is a sweet ambery scent just like this and honestly Ajwad costs a lot less. It is really close, to the point of almost being a dupe. So, it really is that similar.  I love this scent a lot and it does really last all day and you will really get compliments with this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the warm toned scents in this perfume, it was the perfect balance to give a great feminine fall scent, it lasts a good amount of time on the skin too. Really enjoyed this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this perfume is amazing, I can use it daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light floral scented perfume, and I would definitely recommend this to friends and buy the full size bottle for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance is on the heavier side, and a little goes a long way. Iu2019ve gotten compliments on it every time Iu2019ve worn it! Reminds me of Oud.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive only a small sample of this, but wow, this has become a scent I really have enjoyed wearing. It is not overly strong but it stays on my skin really well, which a lot of perfumes tend to wear off after I spray them on my skin within the first hour. I think it smells super lovely and not over the top as some scents give me a headache they are so strong; I would for sure say give it a go if you're into scents with a hint of gourmand while also still smelling fresh and sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

Perfect scent for fall. Iu2019m gonna get the big size. If you like oud and unique scents, this is the one!

reviews.review_text: Love this, i received a dample but its elegand and it lasts long enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells really good! The first time I used it my husband complimented me the whole time! The duration of this perfume is also great, it lasted fresh for almost the whole day. I used it for a wedding since the morning up to the night and I could still smell it. I do recommend this perfume to anyone. I'll be buying the full size.

Personally Iu2019m not the biggest fan of vanilla scents, I prefer citrus scents. I can see myself wearing it every once in a while but I donu2019t see myself reaching for it every day. I would say itu2019s more of an evening scent too, more of a date night. The bottle is very cute.

reviews.review_text: So, I received a sample of this product as part of my honest review. At first I did not like it, I love vanilla and hazelnut scents... But it was something about that citrus scent I didn't like. Now having tried it over and over I do enjoy it, I do layer it with another vanilla scent. I'm not a huge fan and honestly probably wouldn't spend my money on it but I like it.

I only applied to sprays on my collarbones and it was very strong that others around me could clearly smell it too. My boyfriend liked the fragrance but it was just a bit too, powdery and floral for my taste.

It is made up of hazelnut, orange blossom, and vanilla. I personally think the orange blossom and vanilla come through more strongly than the hazelnut. Itu2019s not something that I would wear every single day, but I do think it smells pretty and would wear it on occasion!

reviews.review_text: This scent has a warm scent. I especially liked how the scent continues to develop as you smell it. They somehow managed to u201clayeru201d different scent elements that come out in a really nice way. Iu2019m in my 20u2019s and this this would be a perfect scent for any age.

reviews.review_text: This perfume is very cozy. It feels like a warm hug from a relative that you havenu2019t seen in a long time. Slight sweetness, moderate warmth without being spicy. Slight vibes that itu2019s your friendu2019s rich mom in elementary school.

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed using this perfume. I can definitely pick out the orange scent when I first spray it on. It is a little strong but I personally like that with a perfume. The full size bottle is quite expensive but if you are looking to treat yourself it's a nice pick!

reviews.review_title: Love this sweet girly scent! ud83dudc9d

I received this product for free from influenster and I'm glad I got to try it as it's always hard to pick new scents from descriptions so nice to get a mini or sample size to try first and then I'll go back and get the full size! My boyfriend enjoyed the smell too he said it was girly and sweet! ud83dudc9d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With my body pH, it starts off a little fruity, but has an overall warm smell. Gets less fruity as it dries down. It smells pretty good and lasts a while. Definitely a more complex scent compared to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a woman who loves Madagascar vanilla, I knew Iu2019d love this perfume. It definitely lives up to its u201cintenseu201d designation, while being feminine and sweet at the same time. One spritz on my shirt/neck will last almost my whole 12 hour shift without overpowering me and my coworkers and patients ud83dude02 and for nighttime, a spritz to my shirt/neck, wrists and over my hair. My boyfriend canu2019t stop commenting on how good it smells! Itu2019s bold and strong but sweet and feminine at the same time. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing! The smell lasts all day! I would describe the smell as spicy and bold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Dole&Gabana Devotion parfum is such a beautiful scent. It has hints of floral and fruity but the main scent that I noticed was the warm vanilla. It lasted all day on me as well which is always so nice to have. This is a perfect evening, going out scent and this will last on you for hours. I love that this isnt so harsh as well, it sits perfectly on your skin. I highly recommend this for anyone wanting an elegant warm vanilla long lasting scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from influencer.  This is my honest review. This is just better than the original. Very long lasting and itu2019s very sweet. Definitely I just have for my sweet/ gourmand lovers !

reviews.review_text: Love this scent after Iu2019ve been wearing it for a bit! I found the opening notes a bit sickly sweet and I wasnu2019t sure if I would like the perfume, but as the scent mingles the deeper floral, citrus, and woodsy/nutty notes come out. Itu2019s noticeable without being overwhelming and seems like it has a very versatile scent profile. Not going to be my new go-to due to the initial sweetness, but definitely a solid option when I want to mix things up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good and a little bit goes a long way. It has a long lasting scent that youu2019ll want to keep smelling. Love this!

reviews.review_title: Sweet scent but not too harsh
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet smell its a very nice vanilla base scent i get the vanilla and hazelnut not much blossom but its there and mellows out the other notes i git this from influenster as a sample size it lasted a while on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume really isnu2019t what i expected, it smells most strongly of cinnamon and spices with a hint of orange and vanilla. It smells like a Christmas cookie to me which was totally unexpected. It smells nice but not for me personally. It is pretty long lasting too ! Itu2019s a nice sweet and spicy scent with good longevity and projection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dolce & Gabbana has once again crafted a masterpiece with this fragrance that beautifully balances the richness of hazelnut, the delicate sweetness of orange blossom, and the warmth of vanilla. This perfume is an olfactory delight, perfect for those who appreciate a blend of gourmand and floral notes.  The opening of the fragrance is a burst of fresh orange blossom, which lends a light, airy floral touch that is both uplifting and feminine. As it settles, the heart of the perfume reveals the creamy richness of hazelnut, adding a warm, nutty depth that feels luxurious and comforting. The base of the scent is rounded off with a velvety vanilla note that lingers on the skin, creating a soft, inviting trail thatu2019s perfect for evening wear.  What sets this fragrance apart is its seamless blending of these three distinctive notes. The hazelnut adds an unexpected twist to the usual floral and vanilla combination, making it stand out from more traditional scents. Itu2019s an ideal choice for cooler weather, where the warmth of the hazelnut and vanilla can truly shine.  The longevity of the perfume is impressive, lasting well throughout the day with moderate sillage, making it a great option for both everyday wear and special occasions. The packaging is equally luxurious, reflecting Dolce & Gabbanau2019s signature style with a bottle that is as elegant as the scent it contains.  Overall, this Dolce & Gabbana perfume is a must-try for anyone who enjoys a sophisticated, gourmand fragrance with a unique blend of notes that create a truly memorable experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dolce & Gabbana Devotion is a captivating fragrance that combines rich, floral notes with a warm, sensual undertone. Its blend of jasmine, rose, and vanilla creates a sophisticated and long-lasting scent that is both elegant and comforting. Ideal for evening wear, it leaves a memorable impression with its ultimate depth and allure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for the past week and OMG I love it so so much. Sweet and nutty, the perfect scent. My go to scent right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dolce & Gabbana's Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense is a fragrance that captivates the senses and commands attention. This perfume embodies the essence of modern femininity while intertwining historical elegance and contemporary allure. Upon first spritz, you are enveloped in an enchanting bouquet that speaks volumes about the thoughtfulness put into its craftsmanship.  The opening notes of Devotion Intense are a refreshing burst of bright bergamot and luscious pear that immediately uplift the spirit. As it settles, the heart reveals a floral tapestry of jasmine and orange blossom, creating a romantic and velvety aura that is both soft and empowering. The richness deepens with an underlying warmth, thanks to the base notes of patchouli and vanilla, which give the fragrance its enduring sensibility and luxurious finish.  What sets Devotion Intense apart is its ability to stay close to the skin while radiating an inviting aura. It is a fragrance that embodies intimacy; it feels personal yet bold enough to leave an impression. The longevity is impressiveu2014one or two sprays can easily last an entire day. This quality makes it not just a perfume but a signature scent, perfect for day-to-night transitions.  The elegant bottle design reflects the fragrance it holds: sophisticated and adorned yet minimalist. Its golden accents and intricate details evoke the high-fashion status of the Dolce & Gabbana brand, making it a true statement piece for any vanity.  In conclusion, Dolce & Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense is more than just a fragrance; it is an experience. It tells a story of devotion, confidence, and elegance, making it an ideal choice for those who wish to make a statement with their scent. Whether you're dressing up for a special occasion or simply want to feel exquisite in your daily life, this fragrance delivers on both style and substance. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells really nice and delicate. I love the citrus, and it pairs really well with the vanilla which is not incredibly overpowering like vanilla can often be. Itu2019s strong and lasts long, but definitely does not consume your palette. Definitely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to give my honest review and it smells so good !! I love it and would definitely recommend if youu2019re a vanilla girly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is fine but it's too sweet. I can only pick on the sweetness of this, making it one-dimensional and lack of depth. Maybe sweet is just not my scent. I received a sample of this product from Influenster in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells fantastic! Long lasting smell all day. Even lasts a few extra days! This will definitely be my new go to fragrance! Highly recommend!
